content: Information regarding the PACIO SPLACH Track for Connectathon 29 is available on Confluence: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2022-01+PACIO+SPLASCH

Join us for our Track Kick Off on Wednesday January 5, 2022 at 1:30 pm ET! A recording will be posted on our Connectathon Track page following the call. https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2022-01+PACIO+SPLASCH

Meeting Link and Dial in Information:
Join ZoomGov Meeting
https://mitre.zoomgov.com/j/1609856747

Meeting ID: 160 985 6747
One tap mobile
+16692545252,,1609856747# US (San Jose)
+16468287666,,1609856747# US (New York)

+1 669 216 1590 US (San Jose)

1609856747@sip.zoomgov.com

161.199.138.10 (US West)
161.199.136.10 (US East)

If you weren't able to make the Track Kick Off, an audio recording and the slides are available on our Track Page. https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2022-01+PACIO+SPLASCH
Please join our Track Highlight session today from 11:15-11:25am CT in the HL7 FHIR Connectathon 29 Track Highlights session in Whova. Thanks for your interest in the SPLASCH Track!
